first_para: Patrick Hall (born 20 October 1951) is a British Labour Party politician, who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Bedford from 1997 to 2010. He has been selected by the Labour Party as their candidate in Bedford for the 2015 general election.

full.extract: Patrick Hall (born 20 October 1951) is a British Labour Party politician, who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Bedford from 1997 to 2010. He has been selected by the Labour Party as their candidate in Bedford for the 2015 general election.
full.title: Patrick Hall (politician)
